resources.string: Are you sure you want to quit?
Are you sure you want to restart current game?
There is an unfinished game saved, do you want to continue?
You ran out of moves, do you want to try again?
Congratulations! you finished the game with %d moves. Do you want to play again?
The goal of this game is to fill the board with just one color.
You start with the top-left corner tile and should change color to control adjacent tiles of the same color.
Use the color picker to change to a new color to control more tiles.
Keep changing colors until the board is filled with just one color.
Just be careful to do it before you finish your available moves
Press back again to exit the tutorial or touch to continue.
